known_issues: Backend canister may be stopped causing Backend Actor: Not Ready, role provisioning stuck, and project files failing to load (Unexpected token '<' ... not valid JSON); requires retry deployment/reset to restart canister.

existing_features.title: Trigger a deployment retry by updating the marker file at frontend/public/deploy-retry.txt so its contents change (e.g., update the ISO timestamp on the first line) without changing application functionality.

projectName: Retry deployment by forcing a fresh build
